Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content:
> Do anybody tell me can i able to fork komodo paper wallet generator for my coin
Yes you can just click on the fork button, rename index.html into index.md, then create Creating a GitHub Pages site, like this
https://noctljrne.github.io/KomodoPaperWalletGenerator/
You can alternatively clone the repo & host it on local server w/o renaming index.html
I fork the repo from KomodoPlatform
